channel.title: Landstrider Legion
channel.description: The latest news and announcements from Landstrider Legion

item.title: "Landstrider Legion Jaunt to The Dot" Just Announced!
item.description: The squadron's first major expedition, this is a week long glorious trip to three beautiful sights in the east of the galaxy.

item.title: Landstrider Legion Begins BGS Operations
item.description: As the squadron continues continues a steady growth, the next steps have been taken by the Order of Imperators to begin the minor faction application process.

item.title: First Squadron Wide Event: A Mini Expedition to the California Nebula!
item.description: To initiate many more squadron wide events to come, the Landstrider Legion has announced a mini-expedition to the California Nebula, in celebration of the squadron's creation!

item.title: Update from CMDR Rex Ardem Regarding the Creation of the Landstrider Legion
item.description: Following the creation of the Landstrider Legion, squadron leader CMDR Rex Ardem has said the following...
